### getOrCreateFrameHelper() {#a138bc82a9943aa3008ab86bec2d2c91a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Function &#42; getOrCreateFrameHelper (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &#42; MMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; unsigned &gt; &amp; Regs, <a href="#abc5baba59c735eeb15bdef969b458794">FrameHelperType</a> Type, unsigned FpOffset=0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a unique function if a helper can be formed with the given Regs and frame type.

1) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;! ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ret

2) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;! ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; add fp, sp, #32 ret

3) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: mov x16, x30 ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93; ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48 ret x16

4) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93; ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48 ret 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="M">module</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MMI">machine module info</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Regs">callee save regs that the helper will handle</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/type&quot;>Type</a>">frame helper type</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
a helper function
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return a unique function if a helper can be formed with the given Regs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and frame type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;!    ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ret</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;!    ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    add fp, sp, #32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ret</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    mov x16, x30</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ret x16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Lower a HOM&#95;Prolog pseudo instruction into a helper call while</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// creating the helper on demand. Or emit a sequence of stores in place when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not using a helper call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 With a helper including frame-setup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22, 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 With a helper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 Without a helper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    =&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!HasUnpairedReg);</span></CodeLine>
